Class BlogService

java.lang.Object
com.cb.backend.service.BlogService
All Implemented Interfaces:
CrudService<BlogDto,Long>
@Service public class BlogService extends Object implements CrudService<BlogDto,Long>
Service class BlogService implements CrudService for BlogDto objects.

Provides CRUD operations for Blog entities, converting between Blog and BlogDto using BlogMapper.

Handles association with User for creating and updating blog posts.

Since:
1.0
Author:
Dmytro Babich

    • findById

      public BlogDto findById(Long id)
      Finds a blog post by its ID.
      Specified by:
      findById in interface CrudService<BlogDto,Long>
      Parameters:
      id - the identifier of the blog
      Returns:
      BlogDto of the found blog, or null if not found

    • create

      public BlogDto create(BlogDto dto)
      Creates a new blog post.

      Retrieves the associated User by ID and maps the provided BlogDto to a new Blog entity.

      Specified by:
      create in interface CrudService<BlogDto,Long>
      Parameters:
      dto - the BlogDto containing blog data
      Returns:
      BlogDto of the created blog
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if the associated user is not found

    • update

      public BlogDto update(Long id, BlogDto dto)
      Updates an existing blog post.

      Retrieves the existing Blog and the associated User by ID, then applies changes from the provided BlogDto.

      Specified by:
      update in interface CrudService<BlogDto,Long>
      Parameters:
      id - the identifier of the blog to update
      dto - the BlogDto containing updated blog data
      Returns:
      BlogDto of the updated blog
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if the blog or associated user is not found

    • deleteById

      public void deleteById(Long id)
      Deletes a blog post by its ID.
      Specified by:
      deleteById in interface CrudService<BlogDto,Long>
      Parameters:
      id - the identifier of the blog to delete
